title: कृष्ण की ‘अपमानजनक पेंटिंग’ फिर से हो रही वायरल, पेंटर 5 साल पहले गिरफ़्तार हो चुका है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Pls refer to info shared by concerned citizens regarding an objectionable painting of Lord Shri Krishna. This incident is of 2015. Accordingly, Latasil PS Case No. 127/15 was registered, accused Akram Hussain arrested on 30/5/2015 & painting seized. It is not on display now.
